What are the social responsibilities of companies? Discuss the ways in which businesses can contribute in improving the lives of the local community.

Companies are not aloof, they are a part of society. They are not an artificial thing, but a group of people, who work together to achieve a common goal. These companies grow and develop in the society. They take lots of input from the surroundings. For example- human resource, minerals, forests, etc. In turn, they produce output which are essential in many ways to human needs. In this way, there generates a responsibility of a company towards the society or the local community in which it strives.

 

We can define social responsibilities as a proces undertaken by any company to maintain good governance of the society, keeping in qoute that their business activity does not harm the growth as well as environment of the society in any respect.

 

There are variou ways in which business can contribute in improving the lives of the local community. Some of these responsibilities are-

1. Adopting eco-friendly process for the various business activities.  

2. Providing schools and hospitals.

3. Proper area for parking. 

4. Establishment of recreation places.

5. Plantation of trees and plants.

6. Providing clean drinking water.

7. Providing job opportunities to the local people, etc.
